title: Dealmaster: Coffee gear, iPhone 15 accessory discounts, and more
content:
We've gathered some products that are about getting you through the day, more than anything else. It's all about taking care of yourself, whether it's new coffee gear to get you going each morning or a posh ergonomic chair. There are also laptops, headphones, smartwatches, power tools, and more—the usual!

iPhone 15 accessories

The iPhone 15 Pro comes in four colors. (credit: Apple)

  • ESR for iPhone 15 Pro Max Screen Protector Set, 3 Tempered-Glass Screen Protectors and 1 Set Individual Lens protector for $14 after coupon (was $16) at Amazon
  • Apple MagSafe Charger for $33 (was $39) at Amazon
  • Belkin BoostCharge Pro 3-in-1 Wireless Charging Pad with Official MagSafe Charging 15 W for $128 after APPLE2023 code (was $150) at Belkin
  • Belkin BoostCharge Pro 3-in-1 Wireless Charging Stand with Official MagSafe Charging 15 W for $128 after APPLE2023 code (was $150) at Belkin
  • Belkin BoostCharge Pro 2-in-1 Wireless Charger Stand with Official MagSafe Charging 15 W for $85 after APPLE2023 code (was $100) at Belkin
  • MOZOTER Magnetic Case for iPhone 15 [Compatible with Magsafe] [2*Glass Screen Protectors] for $16 after coupon (was $20) at Amazon
  • ESR for iPhone 15 Plus Case, Compatible with MagSafe for $18 after coupon (was $20) at Amazon
  • TOCOL 3 in 1 Magnetic case for iPhone 15 Pro, Upgraded [Full Camera Protection] with 2 Screen Protectors for $17 after coupon (was $20) at Amazon
  • Temdan Magnetic case for iPhone 15 Pro Max, [Compatible with Magsafe][2 Pcs Glass Screen Protector+Camera Lens Protector] for $20 (was $24) at Amazon
